name: DOOM Eternal
notes: Atm just for predownloading steam version, will try running and changing script on release
content:
files:
- chroma: https://github.com/Riesi/CChromaEditor/files/2277158/CChromaEditorLibrary.zip
game:
  appid: 782330
  arch: win64
  args: +r_renderapi 0
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2015
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $chroma
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/CChromaEditorLibrary.dll
system:
  disable_runtime: true
  pulse_latency: true
